mainContent.heading: What is the Collection Carousel Section?
paragraphs: The Collection Carousel section allows you to showcase multiple Shopify collections in a horizontal, scrollable format.
Instead of displaying collections in a static grid, this section uses a carousel layout that makes browsing more interactive and space-efficient.
It is ideal for highlighting featured, seasonal, or promotional collections while keeping the storefront visually clean and easy to navigate.

features.title: Collection Selection
features.description: Choose which Shopify collections appear in the carousel and control the number of visible items.

features.title: Carousel Controls
features.description: Enable or disable arrows, autoplay, and scroll behavior based on your preference.

features.title: Content Display Options
features.description: Show or hide collection titles, descriptions, and buttons as needed.

features.title: Color & Styling
features.description: Customize text colors, backgrounds, and button styles to match your brand.

steps.title: Review & Publish
steps.description: Review the section in your store and publish it to your live storefront.
